Fields.Name: BSTAPEN
Fields.Documentation: This field's reset value matches GCR_SYSST.icelock. Do not modify.

Fields.Name: FLASH_PAGE_FLIP
Fields.Documentation: This field flips the bottom and top halves of flash memory. This bit is controlled by hardware and should not be modified by software.

Enum.Name: NOT_FLIPPED
Enum.Documentation: Physical layout matches logical layout.

Enum.Name: FLIPPED
Enum.Documentation: Top and bottom halves flipped.

Fields.Name: ICC0_FLUSH
Fields.Documentation: Write 1 to flush the code cache and the instruction buffer for the CM4 (CPU0). This bit is automatically cleared to 0 when the flush is complete. Writing 0 has no effect and does not stop a cache flush in progress.

Enum.Name: COMPLETE
Enum.Documentation: ICC0 flush complete.

Enum.Name: FLUSH
Enum.Documentation: Flush the contents of the ICC0 cache.

Fields.Name: CCHK
Fields.Documentation: This bit is self-clearing when the ROM checksum calculation is complete, and the result is available at bit GCR_SYSCTRL.chkres. Writing a 0 has no effect.

Enum.Name: NOOP
Enum.Documentation: No operation.

Enum.Name: START
Enum.Documentation: Start ROM checksum calculation.

Fields.Name: SWD_DIS
Fields.Documentation: This bit is used to disable the serial wire debug interface.

Fields.Name: CHKRES
Fields.Documentation: This field is the result after setting the bit GCR_SYSCTRL.cchk. This field is only valid after the ROM checksum is complete and GCR_SYSCTRL.cchk is cleared by the hardware.

Enum.Name: PASS
Enum.Documentation: ROM checksum calculation passed.

Enum.Name: FAIL
Enum.Documentation: ROM checksum calculation failed.

Fields.Name: OVR
Fields.Documentation: This field must be set to 0b10 for proper device operation.

Registers.Documentation: Each bit controls the GPIO_EN setting for one GPIO pin on the associated port. These bits configure the corresponding device pin for digital I/O or an alternate function mode. The fields can be modified directly by writing to this register or indirectly through GPIOn_EN0_SET or GPIOn_EN0_CLR.

Registers.Documentation: Each bit controls the GPIO_EN setting for one GPIO pin on the associated port. These bits configure the corresponding device pin for digital I/O or an alternate function mode. The fields can be modified directly by writing to this register or indirectly through GPIOn_EN0_SET or GPIOn_EN0_CLR.

Registers.Documentation: Each bit controls the GPIO_EN setting for one GPIO pin on the associated port. These bits configure the corresponding device pin for digital I/O or an alternate function mode. The fields can be modified directly by writing to this register or indirectly through GPIOn_EN0_SET or GPIOn_EN0_CLR.
